<!-- badges: start -->

A pkgdown template for Pattern Institute R packages.

## Installation

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("patterninstitute/chic")
```

## Usage

Add to `DESCRIPTION`:

```
Config/Needs/website: patterninstitute/chic
```

And in `_pkgdown.yml`:

```yml
template:
  package: chic
  bootstrap: 5
```
